DOC.detailed_description: The ERIC-PPCI 2000 patient 30 UK site randomise control double-blind clinical trial investigate whether remote ischemic conditioning ( RIC ) reduce cardiac death hospitalization heart failure 12 month patient present ST-elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) treat percutaneous coronary intervention ( PPCI ) . It also include 2 sub-studies . The Biomarker sub-study investigate enzymatic infarct size 6 month . The Cardiac Magnetic Resonance ( CMR ) sub-study investigate infarct size 6 month . This study research collaboration Aarhus University Denmark ( CONDI2 trial ClinicalTrials.gov Identifier : NCT01857414 ) .

Eligibility coronary angiography follow PPCI indicate Exclusion criterion 1 . Previous coronary artery bypass graft surgery 2 . Myocardial infarction ( MI ) within previous 30 day 3 .
